package.name: url-apply-coupon-code-link-extension-for-magento
package.summary: Allows merchants to use links to any Magento® page and apply coupon code on the fly to existing or future cart
package.description:
Magento® 2 ready extension.



Magento® merchants often struggle with email campaigns or blog posts that include coupon codes. While promotional emails is a great conversion tool native Magento® customers need to copy the coupon code from the email, shop, add items to cart, and then apply the coupon code, which normally result in lower conversion rate.

Apply Coupon Code Link extension for Magento® empowers merchants to use links in promotional emails, blog posts, and newsletter campaigns to any Magento® page and apply coupon code on the fly to existing or future cart (when product will be added to cart later - after visiting promo code link) without a need for a customer to manually copy, input, and apply Coupon Code on a Shopping Cart Page. The link would look like
http://www.magento-site.com/?coupon=Coupon_Code

Additionally, Apply Coupon Code URL extension for Magento® allows merchants to use links to land customers into their Abandoned Shopping Cart via Abandoned Shopping Cart emails and at the same time apply promotional coupon code via the same URL. The link would look like
http://www.magento-site.com/?coupon=Coupon_Code&quote_id=Cart_Id .
Cart_Id should be pulled from sales_flat_quote table while building a list of Abandoned cart emails by a merchant.

Please refer to screenshots for more information.

Frontend Demo | Backend Demo (Username/Password is presented on admin login screen).

Please note that front end demo has a link http://demo.magephobia.com/mp_auto_apply_coupon/women/tops-blouses.html?quote_id=680&coupon=test representing GET parameters Cart Id 680 and Coupon Code 'Test' , it lands Magento® customer to his cart and applies Coupon Code 'Test' during landing.
Cart Id is optional, Coupon Code URL link will work without it.
This feature dramatically increase conversion rate.

MagePhobia Apply Coupon Code Link extension includes free updates for 1 year + 90 days free support.

Extension is Compatible with Magento® CE 1.5+ and Magento® CE 2.0+
